description: Try our easy to follow Fruit Cake Bombe recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fruit Cake Bombe Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove dessert from freezer, uncover top and invert onto a serving plate. Completely remove plastic. Spread meringue over dessert to completely cover and smooth. Using a kitchen blowtorch, toast meringue until golden brown. Stand for 10 minutes before cutting into wedges to serve.
